meanings.definition: In a manner that is very noticeable or obvious
meanings.sent1: The mistake in the report was staringly obvious to everyone in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The bright red car stood out staringly among the line of black vehicles.
meanings.sent3: His loud sneeze during the quiet movie was staringly embarrassing.
meanings.sent4: The new employee's nervousness was staringly apparent during the presentation.
meanings.sent5: The delicious aroma from the bakery wafted staringly through the neighborhood.
